description: (1)Tree work subject to TPO LBI (No.2) 1955: T41 Weeping Ash - frontfront of house. (2) Tree work in Conservation Area: pruning of Ash in rear  pruning of bay in front. Works: Weeping Ash - front (T41): Crown  lift the pendulous branches up to 10'-12'. Thin crown by 25%.Deadwood and reshape crown maintaining its natural pendulous shape. Ash in rear garden: Remove one small but lowest branch on trunk over trellis.Reduce 2 large lower limbs over road by up to half.Reduce the upper link also over road by one third.Reduce height by one quarter. Dead- wood and reshape leaving a balanced crown. Bay in front:Reduce height by up to 6'.Thin by 20% Deadwood and reshape leaving a well balanced crown.
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
